summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of North 35th Street from Evanston Ave. North to 1st Ave. Northwest; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18624 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
